name: Music Player
description: A comprehensive music playback application for NextUI featuring local file playback, online radio streaming, and music downloading.
author: mohammadsyuhada

changelog.v1.5.1: FLAC metadata support and bug fixes
changelog.v1.5.0: Redesigned Podcast UI with additional features and improvements
changelog.v1.4.0: Podcast playback! Support for bluetooth/usb-c player controls
